title: 大佬帮忙看看哪里有问题？
author: 三颗星
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  LesslagCorePlugin ([较少的滞后]lesslag-1.0-1.12.2.jar)
  DLFMLCorePlugin ([动态光源]DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)
  OpenModsCorePlugin (OpenModsLib-1.12.2-0.12.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.10.3-1.12.2.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin ([1.12.2][更快的加载]MakeZoomZoom-0.0.1.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.8.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 6/14/19 3:39 PM
Description: 
CCL Has caught an exception whilst rendering an item.

You can turn off player messages in the CCL config file.
If you want CCL to attempt to recover the game next time, enable it in the CCL config.

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
at codechicken.lib.render.shader.ShaderProgram.checkValidation(ShaderProgram.java:88)
cadechickenlib MOD验证渲染器时出错  检查下显卡驱动  或者更新一下codechickenlib    当然也可能是依赖这个前置的某些MOD导致的

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
表面上是鸡骨头核心(CodeChineckLib)在渲染龙之进化的能量水晶时造成的崩溃
但是由于鸡骨头核心是龙之进化的一个前置模组，应该是龙之进化模组调用了鸡骨头核心的内容
单纯是龙之进化在渲染物品栏里的JEI物品框的能量水晶时崩溃了，是其自身的bug，需要更新来修复
更新你的龙之进化模组，新版本应该修复了这个bug
同时也请更新你的龙之进化前置和鸡骨头核心
站内搬运贴：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-724610-1-1.html
